cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I shine at night, but I'm not the Moon. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle way up high.
🔥 I am a ball of hot gas.
🌃 You can see many of me on a clear night.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock that travels around the Sun. I am home to you. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I have plants and animals living on me.
💧 I have lots of water covering my surface.
🌎 You are standing on me right now!

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of fire that gives light and warmth to Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You should wear sunglasses when looking at me (but don't stare!).
☀️ I rise in the East and set in the West.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I travel around the Earth, and I shine at night, but I don't make my own light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am round, sometimes I am only a sliver.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🧀 People sometimes joke that I am made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 Some of us are named after animals.
🔭 You can find me by looking up at night.
🗺️ Sailors used to use us to help them navigate.

cosmos.question: I am a cold and icy object that has a long tail when I get close to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I'm like a dirty snowball flying through space.
💫 My tail always points away from the Sun.
🌠 People think I look very pretty when I visit us.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet. I am named after the Roman god of war. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Rovers are exploring my surface.
🍫 My surface is red because of rust.
🧊 There might be ice on me.

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our Solar System. I have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 My big red spot is a giant storm.
🪐 I have many moons.
💨 I am made of gas.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our Sun lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I have a spiral shape with arms.
✨ There are billions of stars in me.
🥛 Mine is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a giant cloud of gas and dust in space, where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can be very colourful.
👶 Stars are created within me.
✨ I am found in galaxies.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🌱 I am a healthy snack.
🥗 You can put me in a salad.

plant.question: I have a stem, petals, and sometimes smell sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 Bees like to visit me.
💐 I can be given as a gift.
🌻 I need sunshine and water to grow.

plant.question: I am big and tall, with branches and leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I give shade on a sunny day.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me.

plant.question: I am long and thin, and I climb up walls or fences. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I can cover a brick wall.
🧗 I need something to hold onto.
🌿 Some types of me are poisonous.

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a vine. You can eat me raw or make sauce with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used on pizza.
☀️ I like warm weather.
🌱 I start as a small green fruit.

plant.question: I have sharp needles instead of leaves and I stay green all year long. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 People decorate me at Christmas.
🌲 I am a type of evergreen tree.
🐻 Some bears live in forests full of me.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am a type of nut.
🌴 I grow in tropical places.
🥥 You can drink my juice.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk. You can pop me to make a yummy snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 People eat me at the movies.
🌽 I am yellow and have kernels.
👩‍🌾 Farmers grow me in fields.

plant.question: I am a root that is orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me, and they help you see in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!
👁️ I am good for your eyesight.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water. Ducks and other animals live around me, and I can be used to make paper. What am I?

hints.text: 🦢 I'm often found in swamps.
📄 Some books are made from me.
🌿 I am tall and grass-like, but I'm not grass!
